concept.shortdesc: Square uses many tools to make businesses successful and profitable.

section.title: Team Management
section.p: With Team Managment, Square users can easily manage their employees and save on labor costs all for free. Team management allows businesses to track their emploess clock in and out from the register. Team managment also offers real-time reports to save on labor costs. Employers can also grant certain employees specific access levels depending on their position.
